| HistoryText             = The Magical Resistance is a group made of  mystics from different realms within the [[Lattice|The Lattice]] whose worlds were destroyed by the powerful creature known as the [[World-Eater (Earth-616)|World-Eater]], leaving each member as the sole survivor of their respective realm. The group is led by the master mystic [[Jack Craw (Earth-616)|Jack Craw]].{{r|Extraordinary X-Men #13}}

When Magik and Storm of the [[X-Men (Earth-616)|X-Men]] were trapped in another dimension by the World-Eater, the Resistance helped them escape, which allowed Magik to retrieve her [[Soulsword]] and kill the World-Eater.{{r|Extraordinary X-Men Vol 1 16}}
